title: Ep. 803 - Culture Wars: The Phantom Menace
description:
Prominent leftists label all whites “racist,” the feds harass more conservatives, and Chicago gives condoms to ten-year-olds.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ
